timeline.bodyText: The javadoc from failWithMessage actually recommends using throw failure instead, as the compiler can now realize we're throwing an error (whereas with failWithMessage it thinks execution will continue).
timeline.author: npepinpe

timeline.message: chore(qa): add topology fault tolerance tests

fix(gateway): fix outdated leader when no other leader

- fixes an issue in the gateway topology when the old leader becomes
  follower, and no new node is elected leader yet, by removing the new
  follower if it's still identified as the leader

chore(test-util): update definition of complete topology

- TopologyAssert#isComplete now also checks that all partitions have a
  leader
